name: HepatitisBVirusInfectionTestsForHepatitisBVirusIgMAntibody
title: Hepatitis B Virus Infection (Tests for hepatitis B virus IgM Antibody)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of  hepatitis B IgM antibody),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Hepatitis B virus core Ab.IgM;  	
Hepatitis B virus core IgG+IgM Ab),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
